action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve user experience and efficiency.
notes: Focus on changing the landing page to calendar or inbox, and upgrading patient search functionality.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process to change the password from the main settings tab.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Ensure to validate the current eSignature ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature used in documents.
notes: Validate the eSignature ID to access the signature drawing interface.

action_item: Reports - Customize the CCDA templates for clinical summaries.
notes: Select the desired sections and arrange them in the preferred order for patient referrals.
